Jargon Term: medication to help remove the extra fluid
Your symptoms improved and you were discharged to a rehab facility.
1. We increased Tamsulosin (Flomax) to 0.8 mg instead of 0.4 mg
2. We increased Metoprolol to 25 mg twice daily instad of 12.5 mg twice daily
3. We have held your furosemide (Lasix) for now; this can be restarted as needed at your rehab.
